event.title: was discovered in Turkish poultry in December, 2005

data.event: H5N1 was discovered in Turkish poultry in December, 2005.

event.title: the discovery of H5N1 on December 15, 2005

data.event: Agriculture Minister Mehdi Eker dismissed the claim, saying that culling of infected poultry began immediately following the discovery of H5N1 on December 15, 2005.
